about.aboutPageUpperSectionText: Established since 2018, the Tierra y Aire ethos has always been one of integration and sharing. Today, we have become the people’s choice for drum education as the largest specialized drum school in Rosario.
about.firstImageCard: We seek to inspire and educate drummers by using their own musicallity and from there to offer resources of contemporary drum education.
about.ourPhilosophySubtitle: Skill should not be harnessed by hard work alone
about.ourPhilosophyFirst: At Tierra y Aire, we believe that passion is the fundamental building block to every student’s success. Through passion comes curiosity, and it is this very curiosity that would spur the student to continuously work, and learn, more on his or her craft.
about.inspirationAndPhilosophySecond: It is our responsibility, as educators, to fuel that curiosity in every student; constantly nurturing, guiding and motivating every student to eventually reach their individual and collective music objectives.

home.emptyCart: There are no products in the cart

faq.difuserRoomSizeQuestion: Which difuser is suitable for which room size?
faq.difuserRoomSizeAnswer: The difuser should always be adapted to the room you want to scent. Small ultrasonic difusers are for smaller rooms up to approx. 15sqm suitable. For larger rooms up to about 30 square meters is a larger one difuser suitable. Otherwise you can also change the dosage a little bit change it, for example by adding a few more drops of oil to the difuser.
faq.howDifuserWorksQuestion: How does an ultrasonic difuser work?
faq.howDifuserWorksAnswer: You fill one up Ultrasonic difuser with some water and then just gives a few drops of essential oil into the water. The ultrasound will do that water evaporates cold and the fragrance arrives very gently with the water vapor into the air, unlike fragrance lamps that use heat work. Depending on the size of the nebulizer and the dosage of the oil you can use it to scent entire rooms naturally.
faq.thirdQuestion: Are your products really free of chemical additives?
faq.thirdAnswer: Our oils are natural, all-natural and organic without any additives. We never use synthetic or nature-identical substances. After what high Quality criteria and requirements we manufacture our products, can be found on our quality page.
faq.fourthQuestion: Can I also take your oils internally?
faq.fourthAnswer: We are only allowed ours essential oils recommended for consumption, which we classify as organic flavoring below of the brand. These are marked as food and can be used to flavor food and drinks. In principle, however, all our oils are subject to the same strict standards quality controls and are natural. However, not all of us are allowed to recommend oils for consumption, as they are distinguished as natural cosmetics. For internal use, certain instructions must also be observed.
faq.addBodyOilAndUsedAsCosmeticQuestion: Can the ethereal Oils can also be added to a body oil and used as a cosmetic product be used?
faq.addBodyOilAndUsedAsCosmeticAnswer: Essential oils are perfect for this. The pure essential oils and compositions of several essential oils certified as cosmetics and can be mixed with base oil and used as cosmetics are applied. The organic aromas from Baldini are extra excellent as food, but they can also be on the skin and used as cosmetics. Some oils have an alcohol content because they are extra for Ultrasonic nebulizers were developed and so better in the air reach, but these can also be used on the skin. On the Oils you will always find an indication of how much oil on how much base oil should be used. Please note that some oils are particularly skin-nourishing, while oils may irritate skin in higher doses. Read the description of the oil and test beforehand, for example in the crook of your arm, whether you have the mixture tolerate
faq.sixthQuestion: Can I also use essential oils for an aromatherapy bath in the bathtub?
faq.sixthAnswer: Yes! With essential oils you can create great aromatic bath additives produce. Please note only a few notes, for example that the Oils can be previously mixed with a base and only added to the already filled tub can be added. On our cosmetic page You will find information on dosage and application in the recipes.
faq.seventhQuestion: How do I dose the oils correctly?
faq.seventhAnswer: Which dosage is the right one is depending on individual preferences and the type of application differing.
faq.eighthQuestion: Can I also use essential oils on babies and children?
faq.eighthAnswer: With babies and children, some application and dosage instructions must be observed. Please see specialist literature about which oils you in what dosage you can use.
faq.ninthQuestion: Can I also use essential oils during pregnancy?
faq.ninthAnswer: In the Pregnancy are some application and dosage instructions too observe. Please visit specialist literature about which ones Oils you can use in what dosage.
faq.tenthQuestion: Can I also use essential oils on my pets?
faq.tenthAnswer: Animals react differently than humans to essential oils. Please inform yourself in specialized literature on the subject of which oils you use in what dosage you can use. For this we can not own give recommendations for action.

subTeaser.title: At Oylo, our appreciation for nature's treasured gifts is boundless
subTeaser.teaserFirstSentence: From diffusers to massage oils, from invigorating baths to aromatic culinary infusions, essential oils serve various purposes.
subTeaser.teaserSecondSentence: Essential oils stir emotions, leading to a positive shift. Enhance your mood with citrus or sharpen your focus with rosemary.
subTeaser.teaserThirthSentence: Our online store offers a range of aromatherapy oils, unique Ayurveda blends, wellness products, natural cosmetics, and enchanting gift sets.
subTeaser.teaserFourthSentence: Oylo ensures completely natural products, free of synthetic additives, parabens, or genetically modified substances.

welcome.title: Welcome to our world of natural wellness
welcome.teaserSentence: where we believe in the power of plants and our Essential Oil Shop is a place for those seeking to boost their health, improve their mood, or simply create a home that smells wonderful and fresh.
welcome.teaserSubSentenceOne: Each drop of essential oils is derived from nature's most precious gifts, sustainably sourced and meticulously distilled to preserve the inherent life force of each plant.
welcome.teaserSubSentenceTwo: We carry a range of oils that can energize, calm, uplift, or purify, all depending on your unique needs.
welcome.teaserSubSentenceThree: We invite you to explore our diverse collection, we also offer a selection of oil-infused products such as diffusers, haircare, and skincare.
welcome.teaserSubSentenceFour: Whether you're an essential oil aficionado or just beginning your journey into the aromatic world, we're here to guide.

ensemble.title: Práctica de ensamble
ensemble.text: Se entiende por ensamble a la agrupación de instrumentos de distinto timbre; conga, djembe, batería de surdo, dum, campana, chico, etc. En este curso se trabaja la práctica y el aprendizaje de repertorio con los instrumentos antes mencionados, teniendo por finalidad la realización de presentaciones en vivo.

handTechnique.title: Técnica de manos
handTechnique.text: En este curso se trabajan los diferentes sonidos de los instrumentos conga y djembe, haciendo foco en las distintas posiciones de manos, para un audio logrado de slap, tono, bajo, palma y punta. (A este curso sólo se pueden inscribir quienes estén realizando el curso 'Práctica de ensamble').

stickTechnique.title: Técnica de palos
stickTechnique.text: En este curso se trabajan los diferentes sonidos de los instrumentos conga y djembe, haciendo foco en las distintas posiciones de manos, para un audio logrado de slap, tono, bajo, palma y punta. (A este curso sólo se pueden inscribir quienes estén realizando el curso 'Práctica de ensamble').

musicalLanguage.title: Lenguaje Musical
musicalLanguage.text: En este curso se trabajará la notación musical y sus valores, es decir, aprenderemos a leer y escribir música, haciendo hincapié en el ritmo.

musicalDirection.title: Dirección musical
musicalDirection.text: Este curso tiene el objetivo de formar directores musicales. Se brindarán las herramientas necesarias para el desarrollo del lenguaje de señas musical. (A este curso sólo se pueden inscribir quienes estén realizando el curso 'Práctica de ensamble').

ensembleComposition.title: Composición de ensambles
ensembleComposition.text: Este curso comprende la invención de voces (patrones rítmicos), para generar ritmo y formas musicales. Procura la creación de plumas o ritmos. (A este curso sólo se pueden inscribir quienes estén realizando el curso 'Práctica de ensamble').

newsletter.registrationDataConsentText: The data you enter here will only be used to send the Newsletters used and not passed on to third parties. You can unsubscribe from the newsletter at any time withdraw your consent by sending us an email. Your data after completion of the newsletter receipt within 3 Months deleted, provided that the deletion is not legal conflict with retention requirements. By sending the entered data you agree to the data processing and confirm our privacy policy.

firstName.tooLong: First name can't be longer than 30 characters.
firstName.shouldHaveAtLeastTwoCharacters: First name should have at least two characters.
firstName.shouldStartWithACapitalLetter: First name should start with a capital letter.
firstName.shouldContainOnlyLetters: First name can only contain letters.

lastName.tooLong: Last name can't be longer than 30 characters.
lastName.shouldHaveAtLeastTwoCharacters: Last name should have at least two characters.
lastName.shouldStartWithACapitalLetter: Last name should start with a capital letter.
lastName.shouldContainOnlyLetters: Last name can only contain letters.

password.tooShort: Password should have at least 8 characters.
password.shouldHaveAtLeastOneUppercase: Password should have at least one uppercase character.
password.shouldHaveAtLeastOneSymbol: Password should have at least one symbol.

email.tooLong: Email can't be longer than 40 characters.
email.tooShort: Email should have at least 4 characters.
